channel.title: Will I be banned?
channel.description: OK, simple yes or no question. Since my brother uses Scar scripts on newb accounts, if one of them gets banned, will my main get banned? Like if they were to ban all the accounts that used my I.P. If its true, I'll be sure to kick his ass. ;)

item.title: Will I be banned?
item.dc:creator: @AnthraX_Leader AnthraX Leader
item.description:
@AnthraX_Leader wrote:

jagex has everythign is recorded even if you change your ip you will be caugt they also record your mac address there is no stopping it if they find 1 account is using scripts all ips and macs will be permanently banned forever no appeals no second chances… joking hack all you want on noob accounts they wont do shit. IF YOU ARE FROM THIS FORUM WILL YOU PLEASE ANSWER SOME OF MY QUESTIONS I FEEL I AM BEING IGNORED!!!
